abstract: Catholic Charities, one of seven agencies supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides financial support to family of Edgar Campos of East Harlem as he struggles with hardships and seeks kidney transplant for his four-year-old daughter, Maria.
lead_paragraph: Edgar Campos and his wife, Amalia, learned in April that their daughter, Maria, 4, had kidney failure, and neither can donate to her.

headline.main: A Lively Little Girl Needs a Kidney Donor
headline.print_headline: A Lively Little Girl Who Needs a Kidney Transplant

snippet: Edgar Campos and his wife, Amalia, learned in April that their daughter, Maria, 4, had kidney failure, and neither can donate to her.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
